00049   * @{
00050   */
00051 static const ReadID_TypeDef SPI_Flash_ReadID[1] =
00052 {
00053   SPI_FLASH_ReadJEDECID_0,
00054 };
00055 
00056 #ifdef SPI_FLASH_CACHE
00057 static u32 uCachePage;
00058 __ALIGN4 static u8 uCacheBuffer[4096];
00059 static u32 uIsCachePageErased;
00060 static u8 uIsCachePageUpdate;
00061 #endif

00063   * @}

00067 /** @defgroup SPI_FLASH_AUTO_Exported_Functions SPI_FLASH_AUTO exported functions
00068   * @{
00069   */
00070 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00071   * @brief  Initializes peripherals used by the SPI flash driver.
00072   * @retval None
00073   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00074 u32 SPI_FLASH_Init(void)
00075 {
00076   s32 i, j;
00077   u32 uFlashID;
00078 
00079   /* !!! NOTICE !!!
00080      Notice that the local variable (structure) did not have an initial value.
00081      Please confirm that there are no missing members in the parameter settings below in this function.
00082   */
00083   SPI_InitTypeDef  SPI_InitStructure;
00084 
00085   /*  Enable AFIO & SPI SEL pin port & SPI clock                                                            */
00086   CKCU_PeripClockConfig_TypeDef CKCUClock = {{0}};
00087   FLASH_SPI_SEL_CLK(CKCUClock) = 1;
00088   FLASH_SPI_CLK(CKCUClock)     = 1;
00089   CKCUClock.Bit.AFIO           = 1;
00090   CKCU_PeripClockConfig(CKCUClock, ENABLE);
00091 
00092   /*  Configure SPI SEL pin                                                                                 */
00093   GPIO_SetOutBits(GPIO_PORT[FLASH_SPI_SEL_GPIO_ID], FLASH_SPI_SEL_GPIO_PIN);
00094   GPIO_DirectionConfig(GPIO_PORT[FLASH_SPI_SEL_GPIO_ID], FLASH_SPI_SEL_GPIO_PIN, GPIO_DIR_OUT);
00095 
00096   #if (USE_HT32F50343)
00097   GPIO_DriveConfig(GPIO_PORT[FLASH_SPI_SEL_GPIO_ID], FLASH_SPI_SEL_GPIO_PIN, GPIO_DV_8MA);
00098   GPIO_DriveConfig(GPIO_PORT[FLASH_SPI_SCK_GPIO_ID], FLASH_SPI_SCK_AFIO_PIN, GPIO_DV_8MA);
00099   GPIO_DriveConfig(GPIO_PORT[FLASH_SPI_MOSI_GPIO_ID], FLASH_SPI_MOSI_AFIO_PIN, GPIO_DV_8MA);
00100   #endif
00101 
00102   /*  Configure SPI SCK pin, SPI MISO pin, SPI MOSI pin                                                     */
00103   HT32F_DVB_GPxConfig(FLASH_SPI_SCK_GPIO_ID, FLASH_SPI_SCK_AFIO_PIN, FLASH_SPI_SCK_AFIO_MODE);
00104   HT32F_DVB_GPxConfig(FLASH_SPI_MISO_GPIO_ID, FLASH_SPI_MISO_AFIO_PIN, FLASH_SPI_MISO_AFIO_MODE);
00105   HT32F_DVB_GPxConfig(FLASH_SPI_MOSI_GPIO_ID, FLASH_SPI_MOSI_AFIO_PIN, FLASH_SPI_MOSI_AFIO_MODE);
00106 
00107   /*  SPI Configuration                                                                                     */
00108   SPI_InitStructure.SPI_Mode = SPI_MASTER;
00109   SPI_InitStructure.SPI_FIFO = SPI_FIFO_DISABLE;
00110   SPI_InitStructure.SPI_DataLength = SPI_DATALENGTH_8;
00111   SPI_InitStructure.SPI_SELMode = SPI_SEL_SOFTWARE;
00112   SPI_InitStructure.SPI_SELPolarity = SPI_SELPOLARITY_LOW;
00113   SPI_InitStructure.SPI_FirstBit = SPI_FIRSTBIT_MSB;
00114   SPI_InitStructure.SPI_CPOL = SPI_CPOL_HIGH;
00115   SPI_InitStructure.SPI_CPHA = SPI_CPHA_SECOND;
00116   SPI_InitStructure.SPI_RxFIFOTriggerLevel = 0;
00117   SPI_InitStructure.SPI_TxFIFOTriggerLevel = 0;
00118   SPI_InitStructure.SPI_ClockPrescaler = 2;
00119   SPI_Init(FLASH_SPI, &SPI_InitStructure);
00120 
00121   SPI_SELOutputCmd(FLASH_SPI, ENABLE);
00122 
00123   SPI_Cmd(FLASH_SPI, ENABLE);
00124 
00125   for (i = SPI_READ_CMD_NUM - 1; i >= 0; i--)
00126   {
00127     uFlashID = SPI_Flash_ReadID[i]();
00128     for (j = SPI_FALSH_NUM - 1; j >= 0; j--)
00129     {
00130       if ((uFlashID & SPIFlash[j].uFlashIDMask) == SPIFlash[j].uFlashID)
00131       {
00132         sSPI_FLASH_Index = j;
00133         sSPI_FLASH_Size = (SPIFlash[j].GetSize != NULL) ? SPIFlash[j].GetSize(uFlashID) : SPIFlash[j].sFlashSize;
00134         return TRUE;
00135       }
00136     }
00137   }
00138 
00139   return FALSE;
00140 }
00141 
00142 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00143   * @brief  Reads JEDEC ID.
00144   * @retval JEDEC ID value.
00145   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00146 u32 SPI_FLASH_ReadJEDECID(void)
00147 {
00148   return (SPIFlash[sSPI_FLASH_Index].ReadID());
00149 }

00155 s32 SPI_FLASH_GetSize(void)
00156 {
00157   return (SPIFlash[sSPI_FLASH_Index].sFlashSize);
00158 }

00179 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00180   * @brief  Writes block of data to the FLASH.
00181   * @param  WriteBuffer : pointer to the buffer  containing the data to be written to the FLASH.
00182   * @param  WriteAddr : FLASH's internal address to write to.
00183   * @param  NumOfWriteByte : number of bytes to write to the FLASH.
00184   * @retval None
00185   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00186 void SPI_FLASH_BufferWrite(u8* WriteBuffer, u32 WriteAddr, u32 NumOfWriteByte)
00187 {
00188   SPIFlash[sSPI_FLASH_Index].BufferWrite(WriteBuffer, WriteAddr, NumOfWriteByte);
00189 }
00190 
00191 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00192   * @brief  Reads a block of data from the FLASH.
00193   * @param  ReadBuffer : pointer to the buffer that receives the data read from the FLASH.
00194   * @param  ReadAddr : FLASH's internal address to read from.
00195   * @param  NumOfReadByte : number of bytes to read from the FLASH.
00196   * @retval None
00197   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00198 void SPI_FLASH_BufferRead(u8* ReadBuffer, u32 ReadAddr, u32 NumOfReadByte)
00199 {
00200   SPIFlash[sSPI_FLASH_Index].BufferRead(ReadBuffer, ReadAddr, NumOfReadByte);
00201 }
00202 
00203 #if (DUAL_READ_ENABLE==1)
00204 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00205   * @brief  Reads a block of data from the FLASH using Dual Output Mode.
00206   * @param  ReadBuffer : pointer to the buffer that receives the data read from the FLASH.
00207   * @param  ReadAddr : FLASH's internal address to read from.
00208   * @param  NumOfReadByte : number of half words to read from the FLASH.
00209   * @retval None
00210   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00211 void SPI_FLASH_BufferDualRead(u16* ReadBuffer, u32 ReadAddr, u32 NumOfReadByte)
00212 {
00213   if (SPIFlash[sSPI_FLASH_Index].BufferDualRead != NULL)
00214     SPIFlash[sSPI_FLASH_Index].BufferDualRead(ReadBuffer, ReadAddr, NumOfReadByte);
00215 }
00216 #endif

00255 
00256 #ifdef SPI_FLASH_CACHE
00257 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00258   * @brief  Write 512 bytes buffer into SPI Flash.
00259   * @param  buf: buffer pointer of data
00260   * @param  uAddress: Address for write
00261   * @retval None
00262   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00263 void SPI_FLASH_CacheWrite(uc8 *buf, u32 uAddress)
00264 {
00265   u32 uTargetPage = (uAddress & 0xFFFF000);
00266   s32 i;
00267   u32 *pCache;
00268   u32 *pBuf = (u32 *)buf;
00269 
00270   if (uCachePage != uTargetPage)
00271   {
00272     /* Change Cache page, sync cached data before change it                                                 */
00273     SPI_FLASH_CacheSync();
00274 
00275     /* Get data from SPI Flash to cache and then update cached address information                          */
00276     SPI_FLASH_BufferRead(uCacheBuffer, uTargetPage, 4096);
00277     uCachePage = uTargetPage;
00278   }
00279 
00280   /* According to the address to get data position of 4K cache range                                        */
00281   pCache = (u32 *)(uCacheBuffer + (uAddress % 4096));
00282 
00283   for (i = 512/4 - 1; i >= 0; i--)
00284   {
00285     if (uIsCachePageErased == FALSE)
00286     {
00287       /* Check cached page need erase or not when it is not erased before                                   */
00288       if ((pCache[i] & pBuf[i]) != pBuf[i])
00289       {
00290         /* Cached page data is different with write data, erase it                                          */
00291         SPI_FLASH_SectorErase(uCachePage);
00292         uIsCachePageErased = TRUE;
00293       }
00294     }
00295 
00296     /* Update write data to cache                                                                           */
00297     pCache[i] = pBuf[i];
00298   }
00299 
00300   if (uIsCachePageErased == FALSE)
00301   {
00302     /* No need to erase the page, write data need program to SPI Flash separately                           */
00303     u32 uCachePos = (uAddress % 4096) / 512;
00304     uIsCachePageUpdate  |= (1 << uCachePos);
00305   }
00306 }
00307 
00308 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00309   * @brief  Sync cache data into SPI Flash.
00310   * @retval None
00311   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00312 void SPI_FLASH_CacheSync(void)
00313 {
00314   s32 i;
00315   if (uIsCachePageErased == TRUE)
00316   {
00317     /*------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00318     /* Cached Flash page have been erased, write all cache data back to the page                            */
00319     /*------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00320     SPI_FLASH_BufferWrite(uCacheBuffer, uCachePage, 4096);
00321   }
00322   else
00323   {
00324     /*------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00325     /* Cached Flash page do not need erase, program each write data in cache to Flash separately            */
00326     /*------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00327     for (i = 7; i >= 0; i--)
00328     {
00329       if ((uIsCachePageUpdate &  (1 << i)))
00330       {
00331         SPI_FLASH_BufferWrite(&uCacheBuffer[512 * i], uCachePage + (512 * i), 512);
00332       }
00333     }
00334   }
00335   uCachePage = 0xFFFFFFFF;
00336   uIsCachePageErased = FALSE;
00337   uIsCachePageUpdate = 0;
00338 }
00339 #endif
00340 /**
00341   * @}
00342   */
